"Xiera": "It seems you have already bumped into the festive Patty and Tia."
"It's just like the situation with Matoi (Halloween). This is not actually them..."
"They are embodiments of Ether, however, unlike the Phantom-type enemies, they don't appear to be hostile."
"So I'd like you to gather data for this investigation. So please continue to treat them well and help them."
